description.en:
Named by combining two words “We” and “Sing”, WeSing is a global "Live Networking Music Platform" that will provide a live community with services where users can connect, sing a song and have fun together. Participants can connect simultaneously by smartphones, PSs, Karaoke facilities augmented with online connected Set-Top Boxes on a real time basis. 

Users of the platform may broadcast not only from one place, but together from geographically different places, simultaneously.
